chats.conversationText:
[USER] Hello, I'm having trouble accessing my account dashboard
[AGENT] Hi John! I'd be happy to help you with your account access. Can you tell me what error message you're seeing?
[USER] It says 'Invalid credentials' but I'm sure my password is correct
[AGENT] I understand that's frustrating. Let me check your account status. Can you confirm the email address associated with your account?
[USER] Yes, it's john.doe@example.com
[AGENT] Perfect! I can see your account here. It looks like there was a security lock placed on your account. I've just removed it. Please try logging in again now.

[USER] Hi, I need to upgrade my subscription plan
[AGENT] Hello Jane! I'd be glad to help you upgrade your subscription. What plan are you currently on and which plan would you like to move to?
[USER] I'm on the Basic plan and want to upgrade to Pro
[AGENT] Excellent choice! I've upgraded your account to Pro. You'll see the new features available immediately and the billing will be prorated for this month.

[USER] Can you help me integrate your API with our system?
[AGENT] Of course! I'd love to help you with the API integration. What specific functionality are you looking to implement?
[USER] We need to sync user data and send automated notifications
